Jackie Chan Adventures: Legend of the Dark Hand
Players, using the paddle controller, catch bombs dropped by the "Mad Bomber" with a set of three buckets.
Activision was the publisher of only the Atari 2600 home version of this popular arcade video game.

Ami, CPC, AppII, ATR, C64, DOS, Mac, PCW, ST, TRS80, TI99
Infocom's first "sex farce"—with configurable levels of "naughtiness"—this game proved to be one of their best-selling games
A sequel to the game above, with graphics, this game eschewed the other other platforms and was released for DOS alone.
